code:
classDiagram
    class ConnectFour {
        -Board board
        -GameState gameState
        -Player currentPlayer
        -ConnectFourObserver observer
        +ConnectFour(int rows, int cols, Player player1, Player player2)
        +getBoard() Board
        +getGameState() GameState
        +getCurrentPlayer() Player
        +makeMove(Move move) boolean
        +getPossibleMoves() List~Move~
        +registerObserver(ConnectFourObserver observer) void
        -notifyObserver() void
        +toString() String
        +main(String[] args) void
    }

    class Board {
        -final int ROWS
        -final int COLS
        -Column[] columns
        +Board()
        +Board(int rows, int cols)
        +dropPiece(int columnIndex, Piece piece) int
        +isFull() boolean
        +getRows() int
        +getCols() int
        +getColumn(int colIndex) Column
        +getCell(int row, int col) Cell
        +getPiece(int row, int col) Piece
    }

    class Column {
        -Cell[] cells
        +Column(int rows)
        +addPiece(Piece piece) int
        +isFull() boolean
        +getCells() Cell[]
        +getCell(int row) Cell
    }

    class Cell {
        -Piece piece
        +Cell()
        +isEmpty() boolean
        +setPiece(Piece piece) void
        +getPiece() Piece
        +toSymbol() BoardSymbol
    }

    class Player {
        -String name
        -Piece piece
        +Player(String name, Piece piece)
        +getName() String
        +getPiece() Piece
    }

    class Move {
        -final int column
        -final Piece piece
        +Move(int column, Piece piece)
        +getColumn() int
        +getPiece() Piece
        +toString() String
    }

    class WinChecker {
        -final Board board
        +WinChecker(Board board)
        +checkWin(Piece piece) boolean
        -checkHorizontal(Piece piece) boolean
        -checkVertical(Piece piece) boolean
        -checkDiagonal(Piece piece) boolean
    }

    class ConnectFourException {
        +ConnectFourException(String message)
    }

    class Piece {
        <<enumeration>>
        RED
        YELLOW
        +toSymbol() String
    }

    class GameState {
        <<enumeration>>
        IN_PROGRESS
        RED_WINS
        YELLOW_WINS
        DRAW
    }

    class BoardSymbol {
        <<enumeration>>
        EMPTY
        RED
        YELLOW
        -final String symbol
        +BoardSymbol(String symbol)
        +getSymbol() String
    }

    class ConnectFourObserver {
        <<interface>>
        +updateBoard() void
    }

    %% Relationships
    ConnectFour --> Board : contains
    ConnectFour --> GameState : uses
    ConnectFour --> Player : has current
    ConnectFour --> Move : uses
    ConnectFour --> WinChecker : creates
    ConnectFour --> ConnectFourObserver : observes
    ConnectFour --> ConnectFourException : throws

    Board --> Column : contains array of
    Column --> Cell : contains array of
    Cell --> Piece : contains
    Cell --> BoardSymbol : returns

    Player --> Piece : has
    Move --> Piece : contains

    WinChecker --> Board : analyzes
    WinChecker --> Piece : checks for

    ConnectFourException --|> Exception : extends
